page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE -1
page.content: August Bank Holiday, 1985. Today I am staying at home with my husband, Brian, daughter Claire and my niece, who is staying to play with Claire. My son David has gone to stay with his grandparents. Brian is a self- employed electrician and will be doing office work most of today. Claire and her cousin are playing outside with other children from the village. After lunch I did some gardening, cut the grass and trimmed the hedges in our front garden. David rang up to say he was going over the Humber Bridge with his grandparents. I was pleased the weather was so good, as so often this year it has been very wet. The girls came in late after looking at some new puppies next door. I packed up Brian's lunch for the next day and went to bed after watching a film on the television. by{MRS ANITA HUNTER
